overview: What I see is a video made in China in Haining , working city with over eight thousand textile factories. This video shows a working back whose job is to scrutinize kilometers of tissue to detect any defect. The body of the young woman oscillates in an endless coming and going right to left facing the tissue that never stops falling and thereby becomes curtain. A daylight, which grabs hold and both remotely, radiates the face we never see or with so few details that recognition is not possible.
title: What I see
